verses.name: Jeremiah 22:1
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; Go down to the house of the king of Judah, and speak there this word,

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:2
verses.text: And say, Hear the word of the Lord, O king of Judah, that sittest upon the throne of David, thou, and thy servants, and thy people that enter in by these gates:

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:3
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; Execute ye judgment and righteousness, and deliver the spoiled out of the hand of the oppressor: and do no wrong, do no violence to the stranger, the fatherless, nor the widow, neither shed innocent blood in this place.
